attributes.action: Increase the age for alcohol consumption to 21 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To reduce the amount of resources spent policing the relentless crimewave by alcohol fueled teenagers. These resources could be better spent on NHS treatment of real patients, policing of real crime, and would it would reduce the threat of violence endured by many people of Britain in their own homes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
